layout.grid_system: Two-column layout: Fixed Left Sidebar (320px) + Fluid Right Content

cards.base: bg-white border border-[#E2E8F0] shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

chat.user_bubble: bg-[#001E44] text-white rounded-2xl rounded-tr-sm px-6 py-3 max-w-[80%]
chat.ai_bubble: bg-white border border-[#E2E8F0] text-[#0F172A] rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm px-6 py-4 shadow-sm max-w-[80%]
chat.input_area: bg-white border border-[#E2E8F0] rounded-xl shadow-sm focus-within:ring-2 focus-within:ring-[#96BEE6]

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on background for paper-like feel (optional)
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b border-white/20 (for sticky headers)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA standards. Use #001E44 for primary text on light backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Login' page with a mocked 'Sign in with Penn State' button using the Nittany Navy color.
Build the 'Main Assistant Interface' with a strict two-column layout. Left: 320px fixed. Right: Fluid.
Use 'Merriweather' font for all headings to give an academic feel. Import it from Google Fonts.
The Chat Interface must feel distinct: User messages right-aligned (Navy), AI messages left-aligned (White card).
Implement 'Collapsible Sources' in AI responses using Shadcn Accordion or similar pattern.
Use the 'Pugh Blue' (#96BEE6) sparingly for accents, active states, and focus rings.
Ensure the 'Risk Indicator' in AI responses is subtle but clear (e.g., a small colored badge: Yellow for Warning, Red for Critical).
Do NOT use dark mode. Force light mode in Tailwind config if necessary.
Use the provided image URLs for the login background and profile avatar placeholder.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Focus on clean, academic typography and generous spacing.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Stick to solid, calming neutral tones.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Prioritize Shadcn UI components but customize them to match the 'ACE' design system (rounded corners, specific border colors).
